text: Liu Fu (born 7 April 1957) is a Chinese former cyclist. He competed in the team time trial event at the 1984 Summer Olympics and 1978 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of China Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China
title: Liu Fu (cyclist)
